caption:
"A glossy ceramic mug with white coloring and a cylindrical shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding beverages. Sitting on a kitchen counter beside a coffee maker and jar of beans."

"A possibly metallic container-type object with dark coloring and rectangular shape. Inconclusive evidence for its function, but it appears to be part of an appliance. Located above a stove in a kitchen setting."

"A possibly glass bottle-type object with red labeling and cylindrical shape. The tapered rim suggests it is designed for pouring. Likely contains a beverage or sauce. Found on a kitchen counter near utensils and other containers."

"A smooth black induction cooktop with a flat surface and digital controls. Rectangular shape with embedded heating elements. Used for cooking food. Positioned above an oven in a kitchen environment."

"A glossy black induction cooktop with a flat surface and digital controls. Rectangular shape with embedded heating elements. Used for cooking food. Positioned above an oven in a kitchen environment."
